column2: BRIEF-W&T Offshore Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.19 May 2 (Reuters) - W&T Offshore Inc: * W&T OFFSHORE ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 OPERATIONAL AND FINANCIAL RESULTS, REVISED 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURE PROGRAM AND 2018 GUIDANCE * PRODUCTION FOR Q1 OF 2018 AVERAGED 36,976 BARRELS OF OIL EQUIVALENT (“BOE”) PER DAY * PRODUCTION FOR Q1 OF 2018 WAS 3.3 MILLION BOE COMPARED TO Q1 2017 OF 3.8 MILLION BOE * SEES FULL FULL YEAR 2018 TOTAL PRODUCTION 13.2 MMBOE - 14.6 MMBOE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-W&T Offshore Files For Mixed Shelf Of Upto $500 Million April 24 (Reuters) - W&T Offshore Inc: * W&T OFFSHORE INC FILES FOR MIXED SHELF OF UPTO $500 MILLION - SEC FILING * W&T OFFSHORE INC SAYS ALSO OFFERING FOR RESALE OF UP TO 45.4 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK BY THE SELLING SHAREHOLDER Source text: (bit.ly/2HqhY9s) Further company coverage:
